item.title: Savage Garden - I Want You
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Daniel Jones, Darren Hayes
KY: 60459 / TJ: 7754

Anytime I need
to see your face
I just close
my eyes
And I am taken
to a place
Where
your crystal mind
And magenta feelings
take up shelter
In the base of
my spine
Sweet like a chic
a cherry cola
I don’t need
to try to explain
I just hold
on tight
And if it
happens again
I might move
so slightly
To the arms
and the lips
And the face of
the human cannonball
That I need to
I want to
Come stand
a little bit closer
Breathe in and get
a bit highter
You’ll never
know
What hit you
when I get to you
Woo
I want you
I don’t know
if I need you
But woo I’d die
to find out
Woo
I want you
I don’t know
if I need you
But woo I’d die
to find out
I’m the kind of
person
Who endorses
a deep commitment
Getting comfy
getting
Perfect is
what I live for
But a look and then
a smell of perufme
It’s like I’m down
on the floor and
I don’t know
what I’m in for
Conversation has
a time and a place
In the interaction of
a lover and a mate
But the time of
talking
Using symbols
using words
Can be likened to
a deep sea diver
Who is swimming
with a raincoat
Come stand
a little bit colser
Breathe in and get
a bit higher
You’ll never know
what hit you
When I get
to you
Woo
I want you
I don’t know
if I need you
But woo I’d die
to find out
Woo
I want you
I don’t know
if I need you
But woo I’d die
to find out
Woo yeah yeah
woo yeah yeah

I just hold
on tight
And if it happens
again
I might move
so slightly
To the arms

And the face of
